FuncDef:
The set-df command disables packet fragmentation based on the Don't Fragment(DF) bit. After that, the packet will not be fragmented.
The undo set-df command enables packet fragmentation. The set-df command disables packet fragmentation based on the Don't Fragment(DF) bit. After that, the packet will not be fragmented. The undo set-df command enables packet fragmentation. By default, fragmentation is allowed.
